articles.title: Who is Priyamvada Natarajan, the Indian-American astrophysicist featured in TIME’s 100 most influential list? - The Indian Express
articles.description: Priyamvada Natarajan is a Joseph S. and Sophia S. Fruton Professor and Chair of Astronomy and professor of physics in Yale’s Faculty of Arts and Sciences.
articles.content: Theoretical astrophysicist Priyamvada Natarajan was on Wednesday featured in Time Magazine’s 2024 list of 100 most influential people.The prestigious list, published annually, includes global leaders… [+2061 chars]
